content: Savings Salary Condominium Property AMA SG Young Investment Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 Sep 2018What's the best way to upgrade from a tiny condo with minimal cash outlay?1 answerAnswerBump0

Soh Sing Heng, Financial Blogger at SG Young InvestmentLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 11 Sep 2018If you're planning to buy a second property while keeping your first one, its best to pay off your first property housing loan so you can borrow the maximum for your second housing loan again. Then, the cash outlay is only 5%. 0 comments2
